title: QFN-24 Package Mechanical Drawing
summary: Detailed package dimensions and tolerances for the 24-pin QFN package with exposed pad.

structured_data.description: Shows top, side, and bottom views including overall body dimensions (3.9 to 4.1 mm), lead geometry, exposed pad, pin index area, and GD&T references. Drawing revision/date visible: 4219016/A, 08/2017.
